name: Hotdog Stacker
description:
Hotdogs and blocks are falling from all directions! Remove all the grey blocks to make space for more hotdogs! Some blocks may be bombs and can remove layers if combined together. Hotdogs can also remove layers if combined properly.

Controls:

WASD - Move piece

EQ - Rotate

Left Click - Auto drop

Made for LOWREZ 2020 Game Jam
